channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- GoCart
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- GoCart

item.title: CVE-2020-9668|2024-09-17T01:00:52.476Z -- adobe -- gocart
item.description: Adobe Genuine Service version 6.6 (and earlier) is affected by an Improper Access control vulnerability when handling symbolic links. An unauthenticated attacker could exploit this to elevate privileges in the context of the current user.

item.title: CVE-2020-9681|2024-09-17T02:26:39.580Z -- adobe -- gocart
item.description: Adobe Genuine Service version 6.6 (and earlier) is affected by an Uncontrolled Search Path element vulnerability. An authenticated attacker could exploit this to rewrite the file of the administrator, which may lead to elevated permissions. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction.

item.title: CVE-2021-40708|2024-09-17T03:23:14.619Z -- adobe -- gocart
item.description: Adobe Genuine Service versions 7.3 (and earlier) are affected by a privilege escalation vulnerability in the AGSService installer. An authenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve read / write privileges to execute arbitrary code. User interaction is required to abuse this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-28568|2024-09-17T00:31:48.488Z -- adobe -- gocart
item.description: Adobe Genuine Services version 7.1 (and earlier) is affected by an Insecure file permission vulnerability during installation process. A local authenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to achieve privilege escalation in the context of the current user.
